Class InvokeHeterogeneousProcessActivity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityCategory, GeneralActivity, InvokeProcessActivity, SuspendibleActivity

    @Tracked(value=TRACE)
public class InvokeHeterogeneousProcessActivity
extends InvokeProcessActivityBase
    This activity implementor implements invocation of sub processes.

    • Method Detail

      • needSuspend

        public boolean needSuspend()
        Description copied from interface: SuspendibleActivity
        The method is invoked by the engine right after the activity is executed, to determine whether to put the activity instance in waiting status. Not all suspendible activities need to be suspended. For example, asynchronous process invocation, event wait when the event is already arrived, etc.
        Specified by:
        needSuspend in interface SuspendibleActivity
        Overrides:
        needSuspend in class AbstractWait
        Returns:
        true if the activity instance really needs to be suspended (put in WAITING status).
